title: Ignited Minds
description: Authored by the most influential Indian President yet, this book delves into the obstacles that are preventing India from rising up to the challenge of development.

title: Steve Jobs!
description: This is a riveting book, with as much to say about the transformation of modern life in the information age as about its supernaturally gifted and driven subject!

title: Macbook Pro
description: All systems Pro. Now available with Apple-designed M1 chip. Buy direct from Apple. For a limited time, buy an eligible Mac with education pricing and get AirPods.
